entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:49 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:49 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
